attributes.action: Grant immediate UK citizenship on award of the Victoria Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the award of the Victoria Cross is extremely rare and is only given for outstanding service to the Crown it is recommended that all recipients, regardless of their citizenship or nationality at birth, on enlistment or during the time of the action so rewarded be granted immediate automatic and unconditional British citizenship with all duties rights and obligations such status confers. This should be retrospective and cover all living VC recipients.
